attributes.action: Add the word "mayn't" to the official English dictionary
attributes.background: We believe that the abbreviation ''mayn't'' (as in 'may not') should be added to the official English dictionary. It is unfair that similar words like 'can't', 'don't', 'shouldn't' and 'mustn't' have earned the privilege to appear whereas 'mayn't' has not.

rejection.details: The UK Government is not responsible for the content of dictionaries.
